languages.text: "Я точно знаю, кому я не доверю прикрывать меня танковым огнем. Это ты, Соломон".
"I know who I definitely wouldn't trust to cover me in that thing. I mean you, Solomorne."
languages.original_text: "Я точно знаю, кому я не доверю прикрывать меня танковым огнем. Это ты, Соломон".

traits.locale_text: "I know who I definitely wouldn't trust to cover me in that thing. I mean you, Solomorne."
"I know who I definitely wouldn't trust to cover me in that thing. I mean you, Solomorne."
"I know who I definitely wouldn't trust to cover me in that thing. I mean you, Solomorne."
"I know who I definitely wouldn't trust to cover me in that thing. I mean you, Solomorne."
"I know who I definitely wouldn't trust to cover me in that thing. I mean you, Solomorne."

languages.text: "Ich weiß, von wem ich mir mit diesem Ding definitiv keine Deckung geben lasse. Von Euch, Solomorne."
languages.original_text: "I know who I definitely wouldn't trust to cover me in that thing. I mean you, Solomorne."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß, von wem ich mir mit diesem Ding definitiv keine Deckung geben lasse. Von Euch, Solomorne."

languages.text: « Je sais au moins sur qui je ne compterais pas pour me protéger dans cet engin. Je parle de vous, Solomorne. »
languages.original_text: "I know who I definitely wouldn't trust to cover me in that thing. I mean you, Solomorne."

traits.locale_text: « Je sais au moins sur qui je ne compterais pas pour me protéger dans cet engin. Je parle de vous, Solomorne. »

languages.text: 「あんな場面で背中を任せたくない相手が誰かははっきりしている。君のことだよ、ソロモーン」
languages.original_text: "I know who I definitely wouldn't trust to cover me in that thing. I mean you, Solomorne."

traits.locale_text: 「あんな場面で背中を任せたくない相手が誰かははっきりしている。君のことだよ、ソロモーン」

languages.text: «Desde luego, sé en quien no puedo confiar para que me vigile desde esa cosa. Me refiero a usted, Solomorne».
languages.original_text: "I know who I definitely wouldn't trust to cover me in that thing. I mean you, Solomorne."

traits.locale_text: «Desde luego, sé en quien no puedo confiar para que me vigile desde esa cosa. Me refiero a usted, Solomorne».

languages.text: “先不管选谁，至少我很清楚哪个人我绝对不能选。我说的就是你，索罗蒙。”
languages.original_text: "I know who I definitely wouldn't trust to cover me in that thing. I mean you, Solomorne."

traits.locale_text: “先不管选谁，至少我很清楚哪个人我绝对不能选。我说的就是你，索罗蒙。”

languages.text: "Bu hususta tam olarak kime güvenmeyeceğimi biliyorum. Seni kastediyorum Solomorne."
languages.original_text: "I know who I definitely wouldn't trust to cover me in that thing. I mean you, Solomorne."

traits.locale_text: "Bu hususta tam olarak kime güvenmeyeceğimi biliyorum. Seni kastediyorum Solomorne."
